topics.name: Reconstruction Era
topics.description: Rebuilding the South, 13th, 14th, and 15th Amendments, and challenges of reunification

media.title: Reconstruction: America After the Civil War
media.relevance: Henry Louis Gates Jr. PBS documentary on Reconstruction
media.notes: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED - 4 parts; best modern documentary on era

media.title: Crash Course Economics: Intro to Economics
Crash Course Economics: The Stock Market

topics.name: End of Reconstruction
topics.description: Compromise of 1877, withdrawal of federal troops, and rise of Jim Crow laws

media.title: The 13th
media.relevance: Ava DuVernay documentary connecting slavery to modern incarceration
media.notes: TV-MA; powerful; covers from Reconstruction to present

media.title: Separate But Equal
media.relevance: TV movie on Plessy v. Ferguson and segregation

topics.name: Gilded Age
topics.description: Rapid industrialization, rise of big business, and wealth inequality

media.title: The Men Who Built America
media.relevance: History Channel series on Vanderbilt, Carnegie, Rockefeller, Morgan
media.notes: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED - 8 parts; excellent for Gilded Age

media.title: The Gilded Age
media.relevance: HBO drama set in 1880s New York high society
media.notes: Julian Fellowes; shows era's wealth and inequality

media.title: There Will Be Blood
media.notes: R-rated; Daniel Day-Lewis; shows oil baron rise

topics.name: Immigration and Urbanization
topics.description: Mass immigration from Europe and Asia, urbanization, and city life

media.title: An American Tail
media.relevance: Animated film about Russian Jewish immigrant family

media.title: The Godfather Part II
media.notes: R-rated; select Ellis Island scenes only

media.title: Golden Door
media.relevance: Italian immigration to America at Ellis Island

media.title: The Immigrant
media.relevance: Polish immigrant woman at Ellis Island
media.notes: R-rated; James Gray film; shows immigrant exploitation

topics.name: Labor Movement
topics.description: Rise of labor unions, strikes, and workers' rights

media.title: Newsies
media.notes: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED - engaging musical about labor

media.title: Triangle Fire
media.relevance: PBS documentary on Triangle Shirtwaist Factory fire

media.title: Matewan
media.relevance: John Sayles film about 1920 coal miners' strike
media.notes: Later period but shows labor struggle well

media.title: Norma Rae
media.relevance: Sally Field in textile workers unionization
media.notes: Academy Award; later period but labor themes

topics.name: American Imperialism
topics.description: American expansion into the Caribbean, Pacific, and Latin America

media.notes: Tom Berenger as Roosevelt; shows Cuba campaign

media.title: Crucible of Empire: The Spanish-American War
A Man, A Plan, A Canal: Panama
media.relevance: PBS documentary on Panama Canal construction

topics.name: America in World War I
topics.description: American neutrality, entry into war, and home front

media.title: Sergeant York
media.relevance: Gary Cooper as WWI hero Alvin York
media.notes: Classic; shows American experience in WWI

media.title: War Horse
media.relevance: Spielberg WWI film following horse through war
media.notes: Emotional but appropriate; shows WWI conditions

topics.name: The Roaring Twenties
topics.description: Economic boom, cultural changes, and social tensions of the 1920s

media.title: The Great Gatsby
media.relevance: Baz Luhrmann adaptation of Fitzgerald novel
media.notes: Leonardo DiCaprio; captures Jazz Age excess

media.title: Boardwalk Empire
media.notes: TV-MA; NOT for classroom; excellent Prohibition era setting

topics.name: Great Depression
topics.description: Stock market crash, economic collapse, and human impact

media.title: Cinderella Man
media.relevance: Boxer James Braddock during Great Depression
media.notes: Russell Crowe; shows Depression's impact on ordinary people

media.title: The Grapes of Wrath
media.relevance: Classic adaptation of Steinbeck novel on Dust Bowl migrants
media.notes: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED - Henry Fonda; essential Depression film

topics.name: New Deal
topics.description: FDR's programs to combat the Depression

media.title: The Roosevelts: An Intimate History
media.relevance: Ken Burns documentary on Roosevelt family

topics.name: America in World War II
topics.description: Pearl Harbor, major campaigns, and home front during WWII

media.title: Saving Private Ryan
media.notes: R-rated; extremely graphic D-Day; select scenes only

media.title: Band of Brothers
media.notes: TV-MA; but historically accurate and respectful

media.title: The Pacific
media.notes: TV-MA; companion to Band of Brothers

media.title: Pearl Harbor
media.relevance: Michael Bay film on Pearl Harbor attack
media.notes: PG-13; spectacular attack sequence; romantic subplot

media.title: Hacksaw Ridge
media.relevance: Conscientious objector Desmond Doss in Pacific
media.notes: R-rated; intense combat; powerful faith story

media.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
media.relevance: Pearl Harbor from both American and Japanese perspectives
media.notes: G-rated; historically accurate; shows both sides

media.title: The War (Ken Burns)
media.notes: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED - personal stories from the war

media.title: Kurzgesagt: What if We Nuke a City?
media.relevance: Explains nuclear weapons effects - relevant to WWII atomic bombs

topics.name: Holocaust
topics.description: Nazi persecution and genocide of Jews and others

media.title: Schindler's List
media.relevance: Spielberg's Holocaust film about Oskar Schindler
media.notes: R-rated; essential Holocaust film; very intense

media.title: The Diary of Anne Frank
media.relevance: Classic adaptation of Anne Frank's diary
media.notes: Academy Award winner; accessible for students

media.title: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
media.relevance: Holocaust through eyes of German commander's son

media.title: Shoah
media.notes: 9+ hours; select sections; no archival footage

topics.name: Cold War Origins
topics.description: Post-WWII tensions, containment, and early Cold War

media.title: Bridge of Spies
media.relevance: Spielberg film on U-2 spy plane incident and prisoner exchange
media.notes: Tom Hanks; excellent Cold War spy film

media.title: Kurzgesagt: The Side Effects of Vaccines â€“ How High is the Risk?
media.relevance: Science and public health policy - connects to Cold War era science and modern debates

media.title: Kurzgesagt: Nuclear Energy Explained: How Does it Work?
media.relevance: Explains nuclear technology - essential for understanding Cold War nuclear arms race

topics.name: Postwar Prosperity
topics.description: Economic boom, suburban growth, and conformity of the 1950s

media.title: Pleasantville
media.notes: Clever commentary on 1950s idealized TV world

media.title: Revolutionary Road
media.notes: R-rated; NOT for classroom; shows conformity pressure

media.title: October Sky
media.relevance: Coal miner's son inspired by Sputnik to build rockets
media.notes: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED - space race and 1950s America

topics.name: Civil Rights Era

media.title: Selma

media.relevance: White House butler through Civil Rights era

media.title: Hidden Figures
media.relevance: Black women mathematicians at NASA during civil rights era
media.notes: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED - space race meets civil rights

media.title: The Help
media.notes: Shows Jim Crow era from workers' perspective

media.title: Eyes on the Prize
media.relevance: PBS landmark civil rights documentary series
media.notes: ESSENTIAL - 14 hours; definitive civil rights documentary

media.title: MLK/FBI
media.relevance: FBI surveillance of Martin Luther King Jr.
media.notes: Modern documentary on FBI's campaign against King
